name: TheAtlantic
text: "If America is coming apart, the 1850s provide poignant lessons. That decade was the only time in our history when the nation dissolved, militarized, and ultimately went to war over competing visions of the future," David W. Blight writes: https://t.co/oMBDRhWYZc
